contents:
Searched in The Sunday Times digital archive (in a university) but got no such result on Jul 12, 1998.

Also searched in The Times with key words "Indonesian" "riots" "Chinese", but it only returned a few results without what you want.

Here is an example: Our escape from Jakarta, P65-66
https://archive.org/stream/NewsUK1998UKEnglish/May%2023%201998%2C%20The%20Times%2C%20%2366209%2C%20UK%20%28en%29#page/n64/mode/2up

You may try your luck here:
https://archive.org/details/NewsUK1998UKEnglish/page/n17/mode/2up
